line_1: Strange Force of Harmony, that thus controuls
line_2: Our Thoughts, and turns and sanctifies our Souls:

line_1: No Sense of Wrong th' ungovern'd Wish controlls.
line_2: No curbing Law restrains the greedy Shoals,

line_1: Strange force of Harmony, whose Power controuls,
line_2: The warring Passions, and informs our Souls,

line_1: Relax from torture; you whom Fate controuls
line_2: That parts the night from morn. Come, restless souls,

line_1: Whom folly guides, and prejudice controuls;
line_2: How do I laugh, when men of narrow souls,

line_1: Such be their Arts, whom Interest controuls;
line_2: KIDGELL and I have free and honest souls.
And Tunes the Diapason of our Souls:

line_1: A time when Rapture the pleas'd Sense controuls,
line_2: And spritely Joy kept Revels in their Souls.

line_1: And int'rest stains, and vanity controuls
line_2: The pure unsullied thoughts, and sallies of our souls.

line_1: No: sordid lust of gold their fate controls,
line_2: The basest appetite of basest souls;
Heav'n is open'd in our Souls,

line_1: Thou Sov'reign Pow'r, whose secret Will controlls
line_2: The inward Bent and Motion of our Souls!
